message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this product is worth a significant amount, but I'm trying to stay within a tighter budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below the value of this product. I could consider coming down to $15,000. This offer reflects the true worth of what you're getting.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $15,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. Can you consider this offer?
